casebody.data:
IN RE: ACCUTANE LITIGATION M-892 September Term 2017
079958 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 12, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of Allan Kanner, Esquire, for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted, limited solely to the brief that accompanied the motion. The parties may serve and file briefs in response on or before April 2, 2018.
